markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Regrowth](/Feats.aspx?ID=2400) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 43 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your command over your vital essence allows you or an ally to recover from grievous wounds. You can cast [_regenerate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=248) as a 7th-level primal innate spell once per day.
name: Regrowth
